comments.raw_text:
The home pages are pages the users start from, like Google, Facebook, Twitter,…
When a user selects the option 'show my windows and tabs from last time',
the option 'open also my home pages if not already open' would the user give a quick start for the things he usually does, and it also gives him, like intended, the session he was working with before he closed Firefox.

This is a double win.
Comments? Or thoughts about if there is a better solution?
comments.author: for.bugzilla@gmail.com
